Abstract: Letter from Robert N Butler (International Longevity Center), commenting on Dec 30 editorial, says the 69 million baby boomers who reach 65 by 2020 will in all likelihood continue to lead productive and creative lives well into their 80's; drawing

Headline.Main: On This First Day, a Fanfare for the New Era; Healthy Longevity
